posts.suggestion: License is valid and meets all requirements
posts.buildingCodeRef: Ajman Building Code 2023, Section 2.1.3 - Consultant License Requirements

posts.suggestion: Distance between main villa and proposed annex in drawing ARCH-112 is 1.3m. Please increase to minimum 1.5m to comply with setback requirements.
posts.buildingCodeRef: Ajman Building Code 2023, Section 4.2.1 - Residential Setbacks

posts.suggestion: Windows in main facade (ARCH-117) have sill height of 60cm. Must be raised to minimum 90cm for safety compliance.
posts.buildingCodeRef: Ajman Building Code 2023, Section 5.3.2 - Window Safety Requirements

posts.suggestion: While all rooms have windows, AI cannot definitively calculate window-to-floor area ratio. Manual verification recommended for accurate compliance assessment.
posts.buildingCodeRef: Ajman Building Code 2023, Section 6.1.4 - Natural Ventilation

posts.suggestion: Stair details in drawing ARCH-124 show riser height of 17.5cm. This exceeds maximum allowed. Please modify stair design to meet safety standards.
posts.buildingCodeRef: Ajman Building Code 2023, Section 7.2.3 - Staircase Design Standards

posts.suggestion: Facade color scheme meets all aesthetic requirements
posts.buildingCodeRef: Ajman Building Code 2023, Section 5.1.4 - Facade Color Guidelines

posts.suggestion: Structural drawings show beam reinforcement but detailed specifications need manual verification by structural engineer.
posts.buildingCodeRef: Ajman Building Code 2023, Section 8.1.2 - Structural Reinforcement

posts.suggestion: Electrical panel placement meets all safety and accessibility requirements
posts.buildingCodeRef: Ajman Building Code 2023, Section 9.2.1 - Electrical Installations
